text: @AmyMcGrathKY Huh I guess he can't walk and chew gum at the same time.  I mean I managed to go to work, keep track of the impeachment trial, take care of my family and I heard about the coronavirus through a news article in December.  Maybe McConnell isn't capable of doing his job.
